title: Collegium novum sive alterum Anti-Calvinianum publicum
creator: Martini, Jacob
subject: Historische Drucke
source: Martini, Jacob: Collegium novum sive alterum Anti-Calvinianum publicum  Quo Mataeologia Calviniana in Loco de Dei Essentia & SS. publisher: Röhnerus  Staatsbibliothek zu Berlin – Preußischer Kulturbesitz, Germany
